KitKat::

She managed to roll out of the way of Windlord's shots. But her torso 
was covered in plasma flame. She dropped and rolled untill the fire 
was out. She growled as the black finish on her metal skin was now 
dirty and slightly senged. She fired several plasma pistol blasts at 
Windlord and Empathy.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Empath::
> 
> Empath couldn't care less about Nightlight, but she won't abandon 
> Windlord, and flies to the attack, spraying Kitkat with plasma fire.
>
